data.description:
**BACK TO BASICS - FREE UPDATE AVAILABLE**

We have listened to our players and have added 10 new, completely free sessions for beginners. Starting to dance has never been easier! 

# LES MILLS XR DANCE

Get moving with the new official program by LES MILLS. More than 40 sessions with amazing music to enjoy! Itâ€™s fun. Itâ€™s fitness. Itâ€™s DANCE!

{845669210999262}

Choose your favorite genre and groove on to different music styles from Jam, to urban latin rhythms, Club and Pop!

Learn and master dancing in the most fun way!

{922840306323327}

# KEY FEATURES

ğŸ•ºğŸ¾ +40 Dance routines, featuring amazing songs by Monstercat

ğŸ¶ Enjoy Pop, Club, Vibe and Jam music styles. Choose your favorite genre, learn and master dancing in the most fun way!

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ« 5 official Les Mills presenters to guide you on your dance journey

ğŸ¥‡ 4 difficulty levels for both beginners and masters of dance!

{860919059488397}

LES MILLS XR DANCE - 1.3.00  - September 2024

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FREE UPDATE - BACK TO BASICS

We have listened to our players and have added 10 new free sessions for beginners. Starting to dance has never been easier! 

Get moving with the official dance fitness program by LES MILLS. More than 40 sessions to enjoy! Jam, Vibe, Club and Pop music styles: Choose your favorite genre, learn and master dancing in the most fun way!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MuÃ©vete con el programa oficial de bailce de LES MILLS. Â¡MÃ¡s de 40 sesiones para disfrutar! Jam, Vibe, Club y Pop: Â¡Elige tu gÃ©nero favorito, aprende y domina el baile de la manera mÃ¡s divertida!

Abbiamo ascoltato i nostri giocatori e abbiamo aggiunto 10 nuove sessioni gratuite per principianti. Iniziare a ballare non Ã¨ mai stato cosÃ¬ facile!

LES MILLS XR DANCE - 1.2.00  - June 2024

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Mejoras en la Interfaz de Usuario: Unificamos la interfaz de usuario. Groove y Choreo ya no son dos pestaÃ±as independientes.
- Ahora Choreo se llama Pro.
- Ahora dispondrÃ¡s de 4 dificultades (de menor a mayor dificultad):
    1. Letâ€™s Dance

- Nuevo sistema de combo: Â¡Ahora es mÃ¡s fÃ¡cil e intuitivo activar el modo On Fire!
- El juego se adapta a ti: EvaluaciÃ³n adaptativa dependiendo de la velocidad de movimiento de tu brazo.
- Sistema de puntuaciÃ³n renovado gracias al feedback de los usuarios.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


- User Interface Improvements: We unified the user interface. Groove and Choreo are no longer two separate tabs.
- Choreo is now called Pro.
- Now you will have 4 difficulties (from lower to higher difficulty):
    1. Let's Dance
    Feeling the Heat
    3. Advanced Steps
    4. Pro
- New combo system: Now it's easier and more intuitive to activate the On Fire mode!
- The game adapts to you: Adaptive evaluation depending on your arm movement speed.
- Renewed scoring system thanks to user feedback.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Verbesserungen der BenutzeroberflÃ¤che: Wir haben die BenutzeroberflÃ¤che vereinheitlicht. Groove und Choreo sind nicht mehr zwei separate Registerkarten.
- Choreo heiÃŸt jetzt Pro.
- Es gibt jetzt 4 Schwierigkeitsgrade (von niedriger bis hÃ¶herer Schwierigkeit):
    1. Lass uns tanzen
    2. feeling the heat
    3. Fortgeschrittene Steps
    4. Pro
- Neues Combo-System: Jetzt ist es noch einfacher und intuitiver, den On Fire-Modus zu aktivieren!
- Das Spiel passt sich an dich an: Adaptive Bewertung je nach Geschwindigkeit deiner Armbewegungen.
- Ãœberarbeitetes Punktesystem dank des Feedbacks der Benutzer.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Miglioramenti all'interfaccia utente: abbiamo unificato l'interfaccia utente. Groove e Choreo non sono piÃ¹ due schede separate.
- Choreo si chiama ora Pro.
- Ora sono disponibili 4 difficoltÃ  (dalla piÃ¹ bassa alla piÃ¹ alta):
    1. Balliamo
    2. Sentire il calore
    3. Passi avanzati
    4. Pro
- Nuovo sistema di combo: ora Ã¨ piÃ¹ facile e intuitivo attivare la modalitÃ  On Fire!
- Il gioco si adatta a voi: Valutazione adattiva in base alla velocitÃ  di movimento del braccio.
- Sistema di punteggio rinnovato grazie al feedback degli utenti.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- AmÃ©lioration de l'interface utilisateur : Nous avons unifiÃ© l'interface utilisateur. Groove et Choreo ne sont plus deux onglets sÃ©parÃ©s.
- Choreo s'appelle dÃ©sormais Pro.
- Vous aurez dÃ©sormais 4 difficultÃ©s (de la plus faible Ã  la plus Ã©levÃ©e) :
    1. Let's Dance
    2. sentir la chaleur
    3. Pas avancÃ©s
    4. Pro
- Nouveau systÃ¨me de combo : il est dÃ©sormais plus facile et plus intuitif d'activer le mode On Fire !
- Le jeu s'adapte Ã  vous : Ã‰valuation adaptative en fonction de la vitesse de mouvement de votre bras.
- SystÃ¨me de score remaniÃ© grÃ¢ce aux commentaires des utilisateurs.

LES MILLS XR DANCE - 1.1.00  - May 2024

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MEJORAS EN EL SISTEMA "ON FIRE":

- VisualizaciÃ³n de niveles:Se ha aÃ±adido una representaciÃ³n grÃ¡fica de niveles junto al icono del rayo. Ahora los niveles se irÃ¡n llenando progresivamente para indicar de manera mÃ¡s clara el estado actual del Modo On Fire.
- Efectos visuales y sonoros mejorados: Se han mejorado los efectos visuales y sonoros que se activan al realizar un movimiento correctamente, mejorando la experiencia de juego y feedback al jugador.


MEJORAS EN LA INTERFAZ DE USUARIO DEL MENÃš:

- NavegaciÃ³n mejorada en pestaÃ±as: Hemos facilitado la identificaciÃ³n de la pestaÃ±a activa, ya sea Groove o Choreo, mejorando la navegaciÃ³n dentro del menÃº.
- Mejoras visuales en botones:Se han implementado mejoras estÃ©ticas en los botones para una interfaz mÃ¡s atractiva para el usuario.
- intensidad de las sesiones: nueva visualizaciÃ³n, intensidad sesiones en MenÃº.


MEJORAS EN LA EXPERIENCIA DE USUARIO

- Nuevo tutorial interactivo: Se ha aÃ±adido un tutorial detallado que explica las diferencias y particularidades de los modos Choreo y Groove, ayudando a los usuarios a entender mejor las opciones disponibles.


CORRECCIÃ“N DE ERRORES:

- Se han realizado varias correcciones de errores para mejorar la estabilidad y el rendimiento del juego.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ON FIRE MODE IMPROVEMENTS

- Level Visualization: A graphical representation of levels has been added next to the lightning icon. Levels will now progressively fill up to more clearly indicate the current state of the On Fire Mode.
- Enhanced Visual and Sound Effects: The visual and sound effects that activate when a move is performed correctly have been enhanced, improving the gameplay experience and player feedback.


UI ENCHACEMENTS

- Improved Tab Navigation: We have made it easier to identify the active tab, whether it's Groove or Choreo, enhancing navigation within the menu.
- Visual Enhancements for buttons: Aesthetic improvements have been implemented on the buttons for a more attractive UI.
- Session Intensity Visualization: New visualization of session intensity in the Menu.


 UX ENCHANCEMENTS

- New Interactive Tutorial: A detailed tutorial has been added. It explains the differences and specifics of Choreo and Groove modes, helping users better understand the available options.


BUG FIXING

- Several bug fixes have been fixed to improve the stability and performance of Les Mills XR Dance.

LES MILLS XR DANCE - 1.0.33 - Update #1  - Jan 2023
------------------------------------------------------
Fresh things for the beginning of the year!! In this first update you will find:

- Upgraded gameplay mechanics. We have designed a system of trails to make your experience more rewarding and enjoyable.
Now you'll dance your moves in a more intuitive way!
- Finally the watch! You will find the characteristic watch used in BodyCombat to check details such as time, calories or additional product information, such as credits.
- New music display! Now every time a song plays on a level, an info bar will appear with the name of the song and the artist - don't miss out on the songs you like the most!
- As always, we've taken advantage of this update to fix little things here and there to make it all smoother!

Let's keep enjoying while we get in shape!

LES MILLS XR DANCE - 1.0.18 - Day #1 PATCH - Dec 2023
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A quick patch based on user feedback to improve your LES MILLS XR Dance experience before, during, and after the workouts.
Thanks to your valuable feedback!!!

â€¢ Mixed Reality improvements
â€¢ Minor Bug Fixes: to ensure a smoother performance.
â€¢ Improvements in pause, offline Mode, and suspension Behavior: enjoy a more intuitive and reliable experience.
â€¢ Localization Adjustments
â€¢ User Profile Optimization
â€¢ Artistic and environmental enhancements: details and aesthetics of the virtual environment.
â€¢ Various Fixes and Stability Improvements: enhancing the overall stability of the app.

We hope you enjoy these improvements and thank you for being a part of the LES MILLS XR DANCE family!
